Our Services

Wire Harness Solutions

From concept to production, we provide comprehensive wire harness manufacturing services tailored to your specific requirements. Our expertise spans connector selection, custom design, rapid prototyping, and high-volume production.

Custom Wire Harness Design

Engineering-led design services from schematic to production documentation.

  • ▸ Connector selection and compatibility analysis
  • ▸ Custom cable assembly design and optimization
  • ▸ DFM analysis for cost-effective manufacturing
  • ▸ Full CAD documentation and drawings

Rapid Prototyping

Fast-turn prototyping for design validation and testing.

  • ▸ 48-hour prototype turnaround
  • ▸ Manual assembly for complex configurations
  • ▸ Quick design iterations and modifications
  • ▸ Full electrical and mechanical testing

Volume Production

Scalable manufacturing with consistent quality control.

  • ▸ Automated assembly for high-volume production
  • ▸ 100% continuity testing on all assemblies
  • ▸ Statistical process control and monitoring
  • ▸ Flexible scheduling and inventory management

Quality Assurance

Comprehensive testing and inspection processes.

  • ▸ 100% electrical continuity testing
  • ▸ Hi-pot and insulation resistance testing
  • ▸ Pull test verification for crimp terminations
  • ▸ Visual inspection and dimensional verification

JST/Molex/TE Equivalents

Cost-effective compatible solutions without compromising quality.

  • ▸ Full JST PH/XH/EH series compatibility
  • ▸ Molex Micro-Fit, PicoBlade equivalents
  • ▸ TE Connectivity AMP series alternatives
  • ▸ Custom connector development

Need a Custom Solution?

Share your requirements and we'll provide a comprehensive proposal within 24 hours.
